dct_title_s: International travel maps Cape Town & Garden Route, Southern Africa : scale 1:10,000, 1:1,350,000 / edited by Yusuke Ujimiya, Mark Ramsay, Tran Hung Nam, Phuong Lan Vu ; Lan Joyce, editor in chief.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by spot heights on Cape Town map, and by spot heights and gradient tints on Garden Route map. Title from panel. Includes text, indexes to streets, towns, and top attractions, map of Cape Town public transit system, and color illustrations.
